title: Blake Shelton officiates wedding of Trace Adkins and Victoria Pratt in New Orleans ceremony
text:
They reportedly went public as a couple two-and-a-half years ago, according to E!.

But on Saturday, Trace Adkins married actress Victoria Pratt in a ceremony officiated by fellow country singer, Blake Shelton.

The duo appeared to have met on set of the 2014 film, The Virginian, having allegedly engaged in a flirtation while married to their exes.

A southern wedding: On Saturday, Trace Adkins, 57, married actress Victoria Pratt, 48, in a ceremony officiated by fellow country singer, Blake Shelton, 43

'Join us in congratulating Trace & Victoria! They tied the knot yesterday in New Orleans,' read the caption posted on the Trace's official Instagram account.

Victoria, 48, looked beautiful in a strapless gown, complete with a tiered, full skirt. The pretty blonde wore her hair curled and in a half updo.

Trace, in true country style, wore a suit coat, black jeans, cowboy boots and a hat. Blake, meanwhile, was dressed similarly to the star, though chose blue jeans and skipped out on head wear.

Fancy: The wedding was held at the Maison Montegut museum in New Orleans

Good work: Antigua Floral was responsible for the beautiful floral arrangements for the venue

The wedding was held at the Maison Montegut museum in New Orleans.

Antigua Floral was responsible for the beautiful floral arrangements for the venue. The entryway was transformed with chicken wire and a mix of maroon, pink and cream roses.

Lanterns hung on top of the ceremony spot. Emily Sullivan Events was responsible for the wedding, while photography was provided by Starling and Sage.

Romantic: Lanterns hung on top of the ceremony spot. Emily Sullivan Events was responsible for the wedding, while photography was provided by Starling and Sage

Elegant: Emerald green velvet tablecloths lined the tables for guests, along with small bouquets of flowers and candles

Just perfect: Gold colored cutlery, basket place sets and white dishes helped add to the decor

Oh, the options! The menu featured chicken, pork and fish

Minimalist: Which such elegant decor, the three-tiered cake was left simple, with just a single, pink rose

Emerald green velvet tablecloths lined the tables for guests, along with small bouquets of flowers and candles.

The menu featured selections of chicken, pork and fish, while the cake was a simple three-tiered dessert with a single, pink rose.

Guests were also treated to a sweet tea bar that included strawberry, peach and lemon berry tea.

A unique touch: Guests were also treated to a sweet tea bar that included strawberry, peach and lemon berry tea

Great entertainment: Music was provided by Harry Hardin and John Zarsky

This marks the fourth marriage for Trace and the second for Victoria. She was previously married to Canadian film director, T.J. Scott.

The couple met in 2013 as co-stars in the film, The Virginian, which debuted in January 2014. They allegedly began a flirtation while both were still married to other people during this time, which was noted on Twitter.

Trace shares daughters Tarah, 36, and Sarah, 34, with first Barbara Lewis and daughters Mackenzie, 21, Brianna, 18, and Trinity, 15, with third wife Rhonda Forlaw.

Absolutely beautiful! While Blake was on officiating duties, Gwen was in Vegas with her three boys. The star turned 50 on October 3, and was treated to a gorgeous cake on Saturday
description: They reportedly went public as a couple two-and-a-half years ago. But on Saturday, Trace Adkins married actress Victoria Pratt in a ceremony officiated by fellow country singer, Blake Shelton.
